profile: Traditional core values are at the heart of everything we do, building and maintaining a solid level of trust with each and every client and ensuring the highest level of customers service throughout a project and beyond. Our bespoke products are 100% Canadian made and our commitment to quality enables us to uphold the highest standards of Canadian manufacturing with a motivated and highly skilled team. We pride ourselves on our passion for meticulous detail. Making a successful interpretation of an idea brings a great sense of achievement. Its what constantly drives us to convert dreams into reality. There is nothing more satisfying than working with a client & delivering what they had anticipated & visualized. Whether itâ€™s a luxury kitchen , a timeless classic from one of our furniture makers, or a contemporary closet, we promise to add a touch of luxury & individuality to your special project. As you would expect from a professional company; we go above and beyond to ensure your project runs smoothly. With $5m public liability Insurance, employers liability insurance & workers compensation (WCB); we've got it covered and our product & installation warranties will provide you peace of mind when hiring our services. Registered in the city of Calgary and the Town of Okotoks.
